name: Dark Workflowy
description: Another Dark skin, started with existing styles (Such as Monokai) and tweaked with some personal preferences.  Uses monospaced font Consolas.
additional_info:
V 1.1.2: Updated 2015/09/29 - Fixed color of items when search criteria are entered.  Several other bugfixes.
V 1.1.1: Updated 2014/05/27 - Fixed color of the expand plus and minus buttons.
V 1.1: Updated 2014/04/30 to support latest workflowy changes.
